Desc.entry: A telephone and email listening and information service run by trained student volunteers. The service is anonymous, confidential, non-judgemental and non-directive. No problem is too big or small. Also serves as a source of information whether you want to know a taxi number or where the nearest supermarket is. A registered Charity

Address.entry: University of Sheffield Union of Students

Telephone.entry: Listening Service 8pm-8am (University term-time only) - free internal line 28787
Information Service 8pm-8am (University term-time only) - free internal line 28788

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - ADVICE AND INFORMATION
